alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 6:10PM CDT until May 13 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Wisconsin... Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Grant and Clayton Counties. Mississippi River at McGregor affecting Allamakee, Grant, Crawford and Clayton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:00 PM CDT Wednesday was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.2 feet on 09/29/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening.
